document_title: PRADHAN MANTRI RASHTRIYA KRISHI VIKAS YOJANA (PM-RKVY)
objective: To bring in synergies between different programmes/schemes of Central and State Governments in terms of planning, process and implementation.
benefits: Financial assistance to farmers for organic conversion and on-farm and off-farm inputs
Capacity building, technical know-how, communicating with marketing channels/other groups and direct marketing of produce to prospective buyers and consumers
Incentives to farmers for organic conversion and on-farm and off-farm inputs
eligibility: All States & UTs will be eligible for funding under PM-RKVY
Inter-state allocation criteria given under programme components at Annexure IV
how_to_apply: Submit proposals to GoI as per approved guidelines and co-ordination with various Departments and implementing Agencies
Implementing Agency should ensure that selection of beneficiaries is done as per details included in the Annual Action Plan for the component for the year which has been derived from the DIP
important_dates_or_frequency: States shall meet twice a year or as and when required to review the implementation of the scheme
